name: My First Plant (Nart Games)
description:
TecnocampusGGJ | #GlobalGameJam 
  • Theme: Roots  
  • Subtheme: Destiny 
  • Demo developed in 7 days!
  • Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/pl%C3%A1ntame-9
GamePlay

Customize your pot and use the "Plantdr" app to meet single plants looking for pots to take root with. Make a match and meet them at Ignacio the Rabbit's restaurant for an unforgettable blind date. Meet your date, discover your destiny thanks to the Pythoness Mari Cruz, and make decisions. 

Will your Destiny take root and will your relationship blossom?
